products.title: Splash Sonar
products.description: Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months stack: a choice of left, right or split. Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across. Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required. Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets. Buy made to measure splash sonar standard panel blinds from soeasy blinds.

products.title: Splash Tropez Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez is an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. The fabric also has beautiful light filtering properties. Electric blinds are perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any home. When purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
